title: Why Do I Regress When They Die - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adventurers   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Death   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dungeons   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Kingdoms   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Persistent Love Interests   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shameless Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Time Loop   Transmigration   Wars
author: Single Wing   单翅
description:
“I beg you, can you please stop getting yourself killed?”

“… But no matter how many times, you will still come swooping in and save my life, right?”

‘Right’ my f**king ass! Do you know how it feels like to have a broken save file after you’ve defeated the final boss?”

>
